name: Inventor Presentation
summary: An IPN file is a presentation created using Autodesk Inventor, a CAD program used to prototype mechanical products. It is comprised of one or more scenes that, most often, give an overview of an Inventor assembly ( .IAM file). Inventor users create IPN files to show details of in-progress or finished assemblies to other users.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.
